fields.description: 'AAA' rated entities and instruments demonstrate the highest credit quality and lowest expectation of default risk.

fields.description: 'AA' rated entities and instruments demonstrate very high credit quality with a very low default risk.

fields.description: 'A' (preliminary) rated entities and instruments demonstrate high credit quality with a low default risk.

fields.description: 'BBB' rated entities and instruments demonstrate medium credit quality with a moderate default risk.

fields.description: 'CCC' entities and instruments demonstrate very low credit quality with a high default risk.
